rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {3101, DEK2111%, GBU1402%, MKB1402%, MKC2110, MKF2111%, MKG1402%, MKT2111, MKT221, MKW2111%, MKW2402%, MKX2111}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKC1200, MKG1120, MKP1120, MKS1120, MKW1120} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKB2402, MKC2110, MKF2111, MKG2402, MKP2700, MKP2701, MKW2111, MKW2402}

description: This unit explores behavioural concepts and theories relating to consumer behaviour and the consumer decision making process. It will include a study of consumer behaviour influenced by individual socio-cultural factors such as family, social groups and group processes, social class, culture and subculture and a consumers individual factors such as motivation and needs, perception, learning, personality and lifestyle attitudes. An overview of organisational buying will be provided.
